Title: How prove this $\sqrt[5]{1782+\sqrt[3]{35+15\sqrt{6}}+\cdots}$ is positive integer numbers.
Content:
Prove that
$$\sqrt[5]{1782+405\sqrt[3]{35+15\sqrt{6}}+405\sqrt[3]{35-15\sqrt{6}}}-\sqrt[3]{35+15\sqrt{6}}-\sqrt[3]{35-15\sqrt{6}}\in N$$ This problem from this My try: let 
$$x=\sqrt[3]{35+15\sqrt{6}}+\sqrt[3]{35-15\sqrt{6}}$$
then 
$$x^3=70+3\sqrt[3]{35^2-(15\sqrt{6})^2}\cdot x=70-3\sqrt[3]{125}x$$ then we have
$$(x^3-70)^3=-27\cdot 125 x$$
$$\Longrightarrow x^6-15x^4-140x^3+225x^2+1050x+4900=0$$
Then I can't ,and I think this is interesting problem, Thank you
llm_answer_create_structured_problem:
###BEGIN_OF_FORMAT###
Assumption: 
35 + 15√6 is a real number,
35 - 15√6 is a real number,
√[3]{35+15√6} is a real number,
√[3]{35-15√6} is a real number,
1782 + 405√[3]{35+15√6} + 405√[3]{35-15√6} is a non-negative real number.
Problem:
Prove that  
$$\sqrt[5]{1782+405\sqrt[3]{35+15\sqrt{6}}+405\sqrt[3]{35-15\sqrt{6}}}-\sqrt[3]{35+15\sqrt{6}}-\sqrt[3]{35-15\sqrt{6}} \in \mathbb{N}.$$
###
